name: Flying Blade
description: Fire a secret dagger from your sleeve at an enemy, dealing 1438 Physical Damage and marking them for 5 seconds.  If the enemy hit is casting an ability they are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.  While an enemy is marked, reactivating this ability on them allows you to jump to them, dealing 2160 Physical Damage.  Casting grants you Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 40 seconds.
effectLines: Casting the ability again against the same target causes you to jump to them.  Extends the duration of Major Brutality and Sorcery.
coefDescription: Fire a secret dagger from your sleeve at an enemy, dealing $1 Physical Damage and marking them for 5 seconds.  If the enemy hit is casting an ability they are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.  While an enemy is marked, reactivating this ability on them allows you to jump to them, dealing $2 Physical Damage.  Casting grants you Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 40 seconds.
